title: Sound On: Congress Budget Vote, Afghanistan
itunes:title: Sound On: Congress Budget Vote, Afghanistan
description:
Guests: Craig Gordon, Bloomberg Washington Bureau Chief, Retired Lt. General Robert Ashley, former Director of the Defense Intelligence Agency, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors, Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
